# For a more realistic and immersive experience in VR!
# Now, anytime and anywhere
# Active Life is T-ON

ã…¤

# Website : https://vr.tioncare.com/


# Discord : https://discord.gg/m4MmxKqh


ã…¤
# Episode 2 Japan Release ðŸŽ‰
- Adventure: New scenario added
- Fitness: New workout moves and map added
- Meditation: New meditation and yoga moves added
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322605_1208344613815402_421218762122313005_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Q7-Mlx-1R4kQ7kNvgHRXxK5&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA3HltXTizmlTz0w2PvF4D2RtBPmnE_ELNr567fXa4BVA&oe=66CDAB3A)
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2540}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974581_890797936220261_7347231846912585020_n.png?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=xong_GLXwBMQ7kNvgHsf7tI&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDmLIsFZ75u83Nzwtp4QCNwxI-t4FZLK7HO4eYDxDAHfA&oe=66CDB33C)
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974857_473226988780119_8255524657792333425_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=EecC8rtlASAQ7kNvgGro2s7&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYApCR5oAzSsF2NSzlKQPFsI5ib3GKm-kgcDV0wn3kydtQ&oe=66CDC8A1)
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035460_523504063463198_1965363717882166996_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=KSjjmlmEfX4Q7kNvgE5SPD7&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA1KYIUQrUO8Swj4kz1qmk0ahZu_FPcqt0bEtldXutyLw&oe=66CDC4FA)
You can check the purchase screen after selecting Adventure Island in T-ON Fitness!
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974827_3877865262539750_1341619935137659954_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=lvSI6N90qX4Q7kNvgHNIn9s&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAByQQekYGKLJbzS9EcH8PO3ZzqR78286FXNiRiDXIjvg&oe=66CDC457)

ã…¤
# Customized workout programs you can only experience at T-ON!
- Choose from a variety of content in three concepts, Adventure, Fitness, and Meditation to enhance your workout enjoyment with the content that suits you best!
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75289915_471515918815664_3189305407806413535_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ia6H5p9yNckQ7kNvgH-Gd4p&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBFp_gyIwZcqoJdXe6fud0rjtOAwV8VRwalKYTxTSOkMw&oe=66CD9A1A)

# Adventure with T-ON Friends!
- Adventure mode where you enjoy clearing scenarios and missions with T-ON Friends!


- Comprising a running-focused Activity mode and a turn-based Stage mode, enjoy without boredom and boost your workout effectiveness!
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031607_1009916526948500_2687761705895360872_n.png?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=E3JQgNN2A90Q7kNvgGIWbz2&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDgSz2dtpnKN1f5SeTii_F54IwO6xkF-T2h8sCpmPjbqA&oe=66CDB9D0)

# High-intensity fitness with your personal trainer, KIKI!
- Fitness mode enjoyed with coaching from your personal trainer, KIKI!
- Based on the user's fitness assessment results, the six customized exercise programs for different physical factors reduce the risk of injury and make workouts more efficient!
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035352_1302146474504158_2312907779485572856_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=agkmP2lA1XkQ7kNvgFSKpRk&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDpTQImJ4A-YnPpCmIX1lTBiBoi2zuzpd_KlV8hjGkqMw&oe=66CDA7C3)

# Cool down meditation for the relaxation of body and mind!
- Meditation mode combining cool-down stretches and mindfulness relaxation after workouts! 
- Embark on a journey to find peace of mind, experiencing the effects of step-by-step meditation against beautiful backdrops such as sunsets, the sea, and campfires
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982695_868676075102674_8045349526861243765_n.png?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ajuJ2iqB5AYQ7kNvgGhmfja&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCSIS4k2Jlps1NFc-FChFWVU3TK2zexw_-LMfZNgm8LOw&oe=66CDA115)

0.1.8 Version Update ðŸ“¢

Hello, dear players!
Thank you for your continuous love and enjoyment of our product.

In this update, we have made the following changes:

â–ª Bug Fix
Fix for abnormal display bug of some buttons when playing with Meta Quest 2 device

Thank you for your understanding.

0.1.5 Version Update ðŸ“¢

Hello, dear players!
Thank you for your continuous love and enjoyment of our product.

In this update, we have made the following changes:

â–ª Bug Fix
We discovered a bug where the language setting should default to English when playing outside of South Korea, but it was mixing Korean and English.

We apologize for the inconvenience and will continue to provide better service through ongoing testing and quality control.

Thank you for your understanding.

0.1.4 Version Update ðŸ“¢

Hello, dear players!
Thank you for your continuous love and enjoyment of our product. 
In this update, we have made the following changes:

1. Bug Fix
- Fix bug with play history when selecting the Adventure section
- Modify title and content text when selecting the Adventure section

0.1.3 Version Update ðŸ“¢

Hello, dear players!
Thank you for your continuous love and enjoyment of our product. 
In this update, we have made the following changes:
